title: ISic020011. ISic020011
body:
1cross_uninterpreted

1cross_uninterpreted

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Cross-shaped sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Cf. Agostiniani 1977, p.11, which reports some parallels with Attic ceramic: Graef, Langlotz 1933, p.128, no.1523, N 456; Milne 1936, fig. 34, no.14; F.Xanthos IV, p.174, nos. 400-401.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 1977 11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201
  • Lejeune 1970 144 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001880
  • Tusa 1966 no.33 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001539
  • Metzger 1972 p.174, nos. 400-401 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001748
  • Milne 1936 fig. 34, no.14 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002564
  • Graef, Langlotz 1933 p.128, no.1523, N 456 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002563
